summary_text: OpenAI releases tool to detect when written works are authored by artificial intelligence. Announcement comes amid intense debate at schools and universities in the U.S. and around the world. OpenAI cautioned that its tool can make mistakes, particularly with texts containing fewer than 1,000 characters.

Instagram co-founders Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger have launched 'Artifact' App is a text-based version of TikTok which will use machine learning to understand users' interests. The application opened up its waiting list to the public on Tuesday, and is available for both Android and iOS devices.

ChatGPT is an open-source artificial intelligence bot that allows users to enter questions and provide answers that read as if a human created them. Those of us in education are concerned about students using these tools to plagiarize and cheat their way through classes. The sensemaking process is how we take in information, process it and use it to understand and generate a worldview.

AI Digital launches Elevate, an optimization and measurement solution. Elevate offers a distinct metric called the Accountability Score to help companies identify growth areas within media plans. The platform also provides total access across data, inventory, scale, and devices to their target audiences at all touch points across consumer journeys.

Instagram co-founders Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger have launched 'Artifact', a text-based version of TikTok which will use machine learning to understand users' interests. The application opened up its waiting list to the public on Tuesday, and is available for both Android and iOS devices.

Real estate agents say ChatGPT is a game changer. The program is free for now, but OpenAI is thinking about how to monetize it. The National Association of Realtors says business usage among realtors has so far been limited. Because it was trained with writing from the internet up to 2021, some of its information is outdated.

The artificial intelligence revolution is expected to change our lives in various areas. It brings with it quite a few moral and ethical questions. Drones, medical devices and even "softer" areas such as hiring, character analysis, social networks and education will be at the center of the revolution.

Study predicts a one-in-two chance that Earth will become 2 degrees Celsius hotter on average compared to pre-industrial times by the middle of this century. The research, published in the journal Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, employed AI to predict climate change.

ChatGPT is a free program that generates text in response to a prompt. It has gained wide popularity since its debut in November, while raising concerns about copyright and plagiarism. The AI classifier aims to distinguish text that is written by AI. OpenAI acknowledges the detection tool is very unreliable on texts under 1,000 characters.

Kodezi is an AI developer tool platform built for productivity. Automated code debugging with detailed explanations. Generate code from instructions. Ask, search, retrieve anything from your codebase! and much more! Try it out kodezi.comLaunched on October 1, 2013.

Artificial intelligence (AI) technology used to transcribe anonymous historic works at Spain's National Library archives has uncovered a hidden gem. Felix Lope de Vega wrote "La francesa Laura" a few years before his death in 1635. The plot, set in France, focuses on Laura, the daughter of the Duke of Brittany and wife to Count Arnaldo.

OpenAI has released a classifier that aims to determine whether a piece of text was authored by artificial intelligence (AI) platforms like its own ChatGPT tool. The company released the tool after various educational institutions and school districts bannedChatGPT because some students are relying on it completely to write their papers.

ChatGPT has passed a US law school test and an MBA exam, demonstrating its high level of intelligence. Microsoft confirmed that it has invested a staggering $10 billion in OpenAI. Microsoft is integrating OpenAIs ChatGPT AI into its cloud technology Azure, providing even more advanced capabilities to users.

The US Department of State and EU Commissions Directorate-General for Communications Networks, Content and Technology (DG CONNECT) simultaneously held a virtual signing ceremony of the agreement in Washington and Brussels. EU and US researchers will join forces to develop societal applications of AI and will work with other international partners for a truly global impact.

DLSS 3 is a combination of DLSS Super Resolution, NVIDIA Reflex, and Frame Generation. It is an intensive AI process involving specific hardware that can generate new frames to boost performance. DLSS 3 delivers over double the performance using less power. Latency, another critical area, is improved over just using DLSS 2.

OpenAI has released a classifier tool to detect whether text has been written by artificial intelligence. The tool could be useful in cases where AI was used for academic dishonesty and when AI chatbots were positioned as humans. But they admited the classifier is not fully reliable and only correctly identified 26% of AI-written English texts.

ChatGPT has caused a stir for its ability to mimic human writing. It responds to simple prompts with reams of text inspired by data gathered on the internet. OpenAI has released a tool designed to detect when written works are authored by artificial intelligence. It warns that its tool can make mistakes, particularly with texts containing fewer than 1,000 characters.

ChatGPT is an application or interface that has become very popular in recent months for being a chat system based on the GPT-3 artificial intelligence language model. It has collected more than 175 million parameters, with a large body of text and which allows answering almost any question that the user has.

The new AI Text Classifier launched Tuesday by OpenAI. It follows a weeks-long discussion over fears that ChatGPT could fuel academic dishonesty. The method for detecting AI-written text is imperfect and it will be wrong sometimes. The longer a passage of text, the better the tool is at detecting if an AI or human wrote something.

ChatGPT is an AI-powered chatbot that has been developed by the Artificial Intelligence (AI) research company OpenAI. The chatbot understands natural language and responds in a human-like manner. The academic community has strongly come out against the AI tool, with several science journals banning the tool from being listed as a co-author.

The Chief Secretary stressed on moving towards use of AI/ML and IoT based technologies for better coordination and monitoring purposes. He asked for making the work of every office be it Police Stations, Tehsil Offices, Hospitals, Engineering Departments, ULBs, Block Offices fully online for efficient delivery and effective monitoring.

OnlyFans star Laura Lux says her fans want to see her'specifically' on the platform. Lux, who has over 2million followers on Instagram, says real life women will always reign supreme on OnlyFans. Lux ruffled a few feathers as she said she was subject to "angry people" who personally messaged her.

OpenAI, the San Francisco-based research firm behind ChatGPT, says it has released a new tool to help distinguish between AI-written text and human- written text. The firm announced the release of an initial version of the release on Tuesday, saying it aims to collect feedback and share improved methods.

ChatGPT has been banned in public schools in New South Wales, Queensland, Western Australia and Tasmania. The tool labels text as either "very unlikely, unlikely, unclear if it is, possibly, or likely" AI-generated. The longer a passage of text, the better the tool is at detecting if an AI or human wrote something.

Artificial intelligence predicts that the world will be 1.5 C hotter than it was before the Industrial Revolution by the early 2030s. The drastic measures originally proposed to cut emissions will now most likely be required to avoid a 2 C increase, according to the authors of the new study.

ElevenLabs' AI speech tool, VoiceLab, lets you "clone" someone's voice from a one-minute clip of them speaking. The cloned voice can spit out any 2,500 characters via a text-to-speech interface. The company is taking steps to stop "bad actors" out there from using its tool for "malicious purposes"

ChatGPT is a chatbot that allows users to ask questions to a virtual therapist. It has been used for self-assessments and therapy sessions. But mental health practitioners are wary of its potential to replace therapy. They say we have to use technology for our benefit and not the other way round.

Google's Sparrow faces a risky and expensive battle with ChatGPT and Microsoft for AI dominance. Google's Sparrow is one of three companies competing with Microsoft and Google for AI supremacy. The company is also working with Facebook and Apple to develop its own AI technology. Google is also developing its own version of Microsoft's Watson, called Watson, for AI.

The White House has formally launched a partnership with India that President Joe Biden hopes will help the countries compete against China. Washington wants to deploy more Western mobile phonenetworks in the subcontinent to counter China. The initiative also includes a joint effort on space andhigh-performance quantum computing.

Google is testing new artificial intelligence-powered chat products that are likely to influence a future public product launch. One of the test products is a chatbot called Apprentice Bard, which uses Googles conversation technology LaMDA. Another product unit has been testing a new search desktop design that could be used in a question-and-answer form.

OpenAI has released an imperfect software tool to identify text generated by artificial intelligence. It comes as worries grow in academic and teaching circles that its tools could enable widespread cheating. OpenAI recently received a multibillion-dollar investment from Microsoft that industry publications said valued the firm at $US29 billion ($41 billion)

87% of respondents said they want more automation in their work. 89% said they wanted to be able to focus on their work instead of other people's work. The survey was conducted on 2,700 people in the UK and the U.S. It is the third phase of the OpenAI project, which aims to use AI to improve productivity.

Computer-based AI appears to be advancing at an unprecedented rate. But the rate of advancement in robotics is slow. Future AI systems will need robotic bodies to interact with the world. Will nightmarish ideas like the shape-shifting T-1000 robot from the Terminator 2 movie come to fruition? And could a robot be created that could live forever?

ChatGPT is short for Chat Generative Pre-training Transformer. It gives computers the ability to understand and respond to natural human language. It lets the computer talk with the user not in short snippets but in something quite like conversation. ChatGPT was released last November by venture-backed OpenAI, and seems to have taken on a life of its own.

DoNotPay was planning to have two defendants dispute speeding tickets with AI "robot lawyers" feeding them what to say. The use of AI in a courtroom potentially constitutes an "unauthorized practice of law," which, in legalese, is a big no-no. DoNotPay CEO Joshua Browder has told NPR, "Multiple state bars have threatened us"

Music is one of the art domains being impacted by AI. The more I dug into this area, I realized how much is at stake and the risks to our Arts Community and to all the musicians who bring so much joy to our lives. Why do a career in music and spend years mastering a craft when an AI model will eventually be able to consistently produce an award winning master piece?

The Razer Leviathan V2 Pro offers head-tracking AI technology via an integrated IR camera to maximize the audio experience for the player. The soundbar beams audio in different directions and offers an integrated subwoofer to deliver crisp, clear treble and a deep and punchy bass. It will utilize 3D audio with THX Spatial Audio.

Skoodos is a school search aggregator designed to allow parents and children to search for private schools based on preferred parameters and criteria. The platform helps streamline the decision-making process for parents and also gives schools an equal and fair chance to showcase their strengths to their audience.

ChatGPT has been banned from Australian classrooms. The AI has learned patterns in language that it can recreate in seconds. It can also generate original essays, stories and song lyrics in response to user prompts. The bot has even proven itself smart enough to pass prestigious US graduate-level exams.

The Equal Opportunity Commission is focusing on the use of AI and other advanced technologies in recruitment. Some 83% of employers, including 99% of Fortune 500 companies, now use some form of automated tool as part of their hiring process. The EEOC is studying the most appropriate ways to handle the problem. It remains to be seen what this would look like in practice.

For Pakistan to progress, we need to change tracks quickly and try to tap into our real wealth, writes Atta-ur-Rahman. Key areas of focus should include information technology, next generation genomics, new materials, energy, regenerative medicine, minerals, and advanced agriculture.

Artificial intelligence will add approximately 15 trillion to the global economy by 2030. Around 97 million people will be employed in the AI industry by 2025. When AI, NLP, and deep learning are combined, they can get closer to replicating human intelligence than ever before.

Robert Zemeckis is adapting Richard McGuires graphic novelHere. He is working with Metaphysic Live, the company that created deepfakes of Tom Cruise. The technology uses faceswaps and de-aging effects on actors live performances to make performers appear completely different without the help of extra visual effects.

Hanks and Wright will be de-aged in the upcoming movie Here, an adaptation of a graphic novel. The de-aging will make it look like Indiana Jones is 40 years old. Disney will use its own Industrial Light and Magic segment to de-age actor Harrison Ford for one scene.

ChatGPT start-up OpenAI has launched a tool to detect AI-generated text. The AI Text Classifier will categorise text on a five-step scale. The tool is very unreliable on texts under 1,000 characters - about 150 to 250 words. ChatGPT has raised concerns about copyright and plagiarism.

Generative artificial intelligence creates human-like content from prompts such as images or text. $1.4 billion was invested in Gen AI last year, up from $230 million in 2020. The International Data Corporation predicts the market will almost double by 2025. It is sometimes delightfully useful and often great fun. It has killed homework, passed an MBA exam and aided cybercriminals.

Retail industry heads expect Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to go for a reduction in customs duty, support for infra development and incentives for corporate capital expenditure. The retail market has made a comeback after the pandemic but is still struggling with inflation and inflationary pressures.

ChatGPT is an AI language model from San Francisco-based OpenAI. It can converse with a person via text and generate a wide range of content upon request. ChatGPT (The GPT bit stands for Generative Pre-trained Transformer) is less amazing, less scary, and needs fewer warnings.

From 2017 onward  and spiking in 2019 there was a prevalence of low-quality documents. Low-quality content tends to be lower in length (peaking at 3,000 characters).Detection systems trained to determine whether text was written by a machine or not are good at classifying low vs. high-level content.

New report assesses effectiveness of sustainability / ESG communication and marketing messaging at leading global firms. Most firms lack differentiation in this topic as they shy away from the tougher topics that audiences expect firms to engage with. High impact topics tend to cover the more political or societal issues which many firms may wish to avoid.
